scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build && cd ../../part2/a_practice && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item build -Recurse ../../part3/a_practice/build
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && eb deploy && eb scale 1 fso-practice
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
